en.dnIsRefusedReviewOfCase: Following a review of your case, the court is not yet satisfied that you are entitled to a decree of divorce.
en.dnIsRefusedContinueWithApplication: To continue with your application, the court has requested that you submit further information. You will also need to pay £{{ amendFee }} amendment fee.
en.dnIsRefusedDownloadAndKeep: You can download and keep the court’s full Refusal Order ({{ refusalOrderFile.fileType | upper }}).
en.dnIsRefusedDoNext: What you need to do next
en.dnIsRefusedDivorceToContinue: If you want your divorce to continue, you’ll need to amend and resubmit it. You’ll also need to pay a £{{ amendFee }} amendment fee.
en.dnIsRefusedSentToDivorceWho: The application will then be sent to your {{ divorceWho }}  again so that they can respond.

noJurisdiction.title: Jurisdiction details
noJurisdiction.description: Your application does not fall within the jurisdiction of the courts of England and Wales.

noCriteria.title: Application does not meet criteria
noCriteria.description: Your application does not meet the criteria for the grounds of divorce that you selected.

insufficentDetails.title: Insufficient details in application
insufficentDetails.description: The court has judged that your application does not demonstrate that the marriage has broken down irretrievably. To grant a divorce the court must be satisfied that the marriage has broken down irretrievably, based on the information set out in the application.

other.title: The court has provided the following comments

cy.dnIsRefusedTitle: Mae eich cais wedi cael ei wrthod
cy.dnIsRefusedReviewOfCase: Ar ôl adolygu eich cais, nid yw’r llys yn fodlon eto eich bod chi’n gymwys i gael dyfarniad ysgaru.
cy.dnIsRefusedContinueWithApplication: I barhau â’ch cais, mae’r llys wedi gofyn ichi gyflwyno rhagor o wybodaeth.  Bydd rhaid i chi hefyd dalu ffi o £{{ amendFee }} i newid eich cais.
cy.dnIsRefusedDownloadAndKeep: Gallwch lawrlwytho a chadw'r Gorchymyn Gwrthod ({{ refusalOrderFile.fileType | upper }}).
cy.dnIsRefusedDoNext: Beth sydd angen i chi ei wneud nesaf
cy.dnIsRefusedDivorceToContinue: Os ydych eisiau i'ch ysgariad barhau, bydd angen ichi wneud newidiadau i’ch cais a’i ailgyflwyno. Bydd rhaid ichi hefyd dalu ffi o £{{ amendFee }} i newid eich cais.
cy.dnIsRefusedSentToDivorceWho: Yna bydd y cais yn cael ei anfon i’ch {{ divorceWho }} eto fel y gallant ymateb.

noJurisdiction.title: Pwerau Cyfreithiol Llysoedd Cymru a Lloegr
noJurisdiction.description: Nid yw eich cais yn disgyn o fewn pwerau cyfreithiol Llysoedd Cymru a Lloegr.

noCriteria.title: Nid yw eich cais yn bodloni'r meini prawf
noCriteria.description: Nid yw eich cais yn bodloni'r meini prawf ar gyfer y rheswm rydych wedi’i ddewis dros gael ysgariad.

insufficentDetails.title: Manylion annigonol yn y cais
insufficentDetails.description: Mae'r Llys wedi penderfynu nad yw eich cais yn dangos bod y briodas wedi chwalu’n gyfan gwbl. I ganiatáu ysgariad, rhaid i'r llys fod yn fodlon bod y briodas wedi chwalu’n gyfan gwbl, yn seiliedig ar y wybodaeth sydd yn y cais.

other.title: Mae'r llys wedi darparu'r sylwadau canlynol
